info.title: Meadow Open API
info.description: The API to connect to the Meadow platform

get.description: Retrieves the status of the order for that ID

status.description:
The status of the order. One of `draft`, `new`, `packed`, `fulfilled`, `canceled`

- `draft` is an order submitted without inventory taken out
- `new` is an order that has had inventory associated with it
- `packed` signifies an order has been processed and is waiting for pickup/delivery
- `fulfilled` is an order that has been fully completed
- `canceled` is an order that has been canceled

post.description: Retrieve pricing information for a cart (prices, discounts, taxes, etc.)

type.description: Order type - must be either `delivery` or `pickup`

lineItems.description: An array of products to buy

productOptionId.description: The ID from the menu api response (`https://daffodil.getmeadow.com`) `data[].options[].id`

quantity.description: The quantity of this product option to purchase

customer.description: The customer for this order. This object is optional, but if provided, must have a `firstName`, `lastName` and either an `email` or `phone`.

firstName.description: The first name of the customer

lastName.description: The last name of the customer. Multiple last names may be separated by a space.

email.description: The email of the customer. At least one of email, phone must be provided.

phone.description: The phone of the customer. At least one of email, phone must be provided.

postalCode.description: The postal code for this order. This will take into account an organization’s order minimums

deliveryFee.description: A fee that will be passed through and added onto the `customerGrandTotal`

deliveryFeeDescription.description: A passthrough title for the delivery fee

lineItems.description: The line items of this cart

productOptionId.description: The product option ID for this line item

quantity.description: The quantity of this line item

unitPrice.description: The unit price for a single quantity of this line item

subtotalPrice.description: The total cost of all quantities of this line item before discounts

finalPrice.description: The final cost of this line item after discounts

discounts.description: An array of automatic discounts applied to this line item (may be empty)

amountUsed.description: The amount of the discount represented in cents.

description.description: The description of the discount, which may be shown to the customer

totalPrice.description: The subtotal price before discounts, credits, adjustments are taken into account.

netPrice.description: The final price of the order before payment & delivery fees.

customerGrandTotal.description: The cost of the order that the customer will pay

discounts.description: An array of order level discounts

amountUsed.description: The amount of the discount represented in cents

description.description: The description of the discount, which may be shown to the customer

credits.description: An array of credits applied. May be store credit or promo codes attached to the customers account.

amountUsed.description: The amount of the credit used represented in cents

description.description: The description of the credit, which may be shown to the customer

adjustments.description: An array of adjustments made to the order. May be a tax exemption or other future Meadow POS behavior.

amount.description: The amount of the adjustment represented in cents.

description.description: The description of the adjustment, which may be shown to the customer

taxes.description: All of the taxes that will be applied if an order is placed with this cart

amount.description: The amount of the tax represented in cents to show to the user

description.description: The description of the tax to show to the user

orderMinimum.description: The order minimum for this dispensary and postal code

metOrderMinimum.description: Whether this cart has met the order minimum or not

idempotencyKey.description: A string that should be used when creating an order to ensure idempotency and avoid double orders due to server miscommunication.

get.description: Retrieve all orders for an organization in reverse chronological order. 50 orders will be returned at a time and may be paginated using the `startingAfter` query parameter.

parameters.name: startingAfter
parameters.description: The `id` for an order that you want to retrieve all orders after this one. Pass in the last `id` in a response to retrieve the next page.

parameters.name: startingOn
parameters.description: A date that must be formatted as `YYYY-MM-DD`. When submitted, the response will return the latest order on that day and continue in reverse chronological order. I.E. if `2022-11-25` is passed in, the first order will be as close to 11:59pm November 25th, 2022 as possible.

parameters.name: fulfilledOnly
parameters.description: When passed in as `true`, only fulfilled orders will be returned. The response will be ordered in reverse chronological order of fulfilled date. Also, this will cause `startingOn` to use `fulfilledAt` instead of `createdAt` for determining what orders to return.

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: One of `delivery`, `pickup`, or `in-store`. Only orders of that type will be returned if this parameter is passed in.

post.description: Create an order for a customer

type.description: Order type - must be either `delivery` or `pickup`

lineItems.description: An array of products to buy

productOptionId.description: The ID from the menu api response (`https://daffodil.getmeadow.com`) `data[].options[].id`

quantity.description: The quantity of this product option to purchase

customer.description: The customer for this order. This object is optional, but if provided, must have a `firstName`, `lastName` and either an `email` or `phone`.

firstName.description: The first name of the customer

lastName.description: The last name of the customer. Multiple last names may be separated by a space.

email.description: The email of the customer. At least one of email, phone must be provided.

phone.description: The phone of the customer. At least one of email, phone must be provided.

address.description: The address of the customer. Required if `type` is set to `delivery`

idempotencyKey.description: Key to help avoid double orders due to server miscommunication. Please see "Idempotent Requests" section. Please use the string provided to you by the pricing endpoint. This value must be a v4 UUID.

deliveryNotes.description: Optional notes field to help fulfill the order (Example: please call on delivery)

deliveryFee.description: A fee that will be passed through and added onto the `customerGrandTotal`

deliveryFeeDescription.description: A passthrough title for the delivery fee

discountCodes.description: An array of promo codes to redeem. These codes must already exist in the Meadow backend.

id.description: The ID for the order. Used to fetch status updates

status.description: The status of the order. Will be set to `draft` or `new` depending on the organization's settings.

totalPrice.description: The subtotal price before discounts, credits, adjustments are taken into account.

netPrice.description: The final price of the order before payment & delivery fees.

customerGrandTotal.description: The cost of the order that the customer will pay

lineItems.description: The line items with pricing information attached

productOptionId.description: The product option ID for this line item

quantity.description: The quantity of this line item

unitPrice.description: The unit price for a single quantity of this line item

subtotalPrice.description: The total cost of all quantities of this line item before discounts

finalPrice.description: The final cost of this line item after discounts

discounts.description: An array of automatic discounts applied to this line item (may be empty)

amountUsed.description: The amount of the discount represented in cents.

description.description: The description of the discount, which may be shown to the customer

discounts.description: An array of order level discounts

amountUsed.description: The amount of the discount represented in cents

description.description: The description of the discount, which may be shown to the customer

credits.description: An array of credits applied. May be store credit or promo codes attached to the customers account.

amountUsed.description: The amount of the credit used represented in cents

description.description: The description of the credit, which may be shown to the customer

adjustments.description: An array of adjustments made to the order. May be a tax exemption or other future Meadow POS behavior.

amount.description: The amount of the adjustment represented in cents.

description.description: The description of the adjustment, which may be shown to the customer

taxes.description: All of the taxes applied to this order

amount.description: The amount of the tax represented in cents to show to the user

description.description: The description of the tax to show to the user

get.description: Retrieve information about a specific order
Retrieve all order returns for an organization in reverse chronological order. 50 order returns will be returned at a time and may be paginated using the `startingAfter` query parameter.

parameters.name: startingAfter
parameters.description: The `id` for an order return that you want to retrieve all order returns after this one. Pass in the last `id` in a response to retrieve the next page.

parameters.name: voided
parameters.description: Pass in `true` if you would like to only receive voided returns. Voided returns are ones that were cancelled and are no longer considered valid.

get.description: Fetch the menu for an organization

parameters.name: type
parameters.description:
Request a menu for one of three types: `delivery`, `pickup` or `in-store`. If `type` is not passed in, the menu for `delivery` will be returned.

Each Meadow client essentially has three different menus. If you intend to support an order flow for more than one type, you should pull each menu by sending in this parameter.

thcAmount.description: The amount of THC in the product

thcAmountEach.description: The amount of THC per each of the product

cbdAmount.description: The amount of CBD in the product

cbdAmountEach.description: The amount of CBD per each of the product

description.description: A text description about the product

isFeatured.description: Whether the product is featured or not

inStock.description: Whether there is at least one option of this product in stock currently

options.description: All of the pricing options for a product

id.description: The ID of this product option. This value will be used for placing orders

amount.description: The amount of the underlying unit of this product

price.description: The price in cents of this option

salesPrice.description: The sales price if one exists

upc.description: The UPC code for this option

maxQuantity.description: The maximum number that is purchaseable based on current inventory

photos.description: Array of the photos for a product

fullPath.description: The URL to use to display the photo

primaryCategory.description: The primary category of the product

name.description: The name of the primary category

subCategories.description: Array of the sub-categories for the product

data.name: 7 Pre-rolled Smokes
data.description:
7 pre-rolled smokes
0.5 grams each
3.5 grams total

get.description: Fetch all of the product tags for an organziation

productIds.description: An array of IDs that will correspond to the id property of each product from the [Retrieve Menu](/endpoints/products/get-menu) endpoint. This value can be null if it does not have any products associated with it.

data.name: Top shelf
data.description: Only the dankest nugs get this designation

put.description: Update UPC fields for product options

parameters.name: productId
parameters.description: ID of the product these options belong to

options.description: Array of product options to update

id.description: The ID from the menu api response `data[].options[].id`

upc.description: The new UPC for this option

options.description: The options for this product. Please note that all options will be returned, not just the ones you submitted.

message.example: A description of the error code

totalPrice.description: The subtotal price before discounts, credits, adjustments are taken into account.

netPrice.description: The final price of the order before payment & delivery fees. Includes taxes

customerGrandTotal.description: The final price of the order after all fees

createdAt.description: The datetime the order was created

packedAt.description: The datetime the order was packed on

fulfilledAt.description: The date the order was fulfilled

status.description:
The status of the order. One of `draft`, `new`, `packed`, `fulfilled`, `canceled`

- `draft` is an order submitted without inventory taken out
- `new` is an order that has had inventory associated with it
- `packed` signifies an order has been processed and is waiting for pickup/delivery
- `fulfilled` is an order that has been fully completed
- `canceled` is an order that has been canceled

cancelationReason.description: A description of why the order was canceled

taxExempt.description: Whether this order was marked as tax exempt or not

refundTotal.description: The amount refunded by returns on this order

isMedical.description: Whether this order was for a medical customer or not

customerName.description: The name of the customer for express pickup or kiosk orders.

deliveryFee.description: The delivery fee for the order

deliveryFeeDescription.description: A description of the delivery fee that can be shown to the customer

lineItems.description: All of the products purchased with this order

id.description: The ID of this line item

quantity.description: The quantity of this line item

productId.description: The id of the product purchased

productName.description: The name of the product purchased

optionId.description: he id of the product option purchased

optionName.description: The name of the product option

optionPrice.description: The price of the product option at time of purchase

optionSalesPrice.description: The price of the product option at time of purchase if it was on sale

productBrandId.description: The brand id of the product

productBrand.description: The name of the brand of the product

unitPrice.description: The price per unit of this line item

subtotalPrice.description: The subtotal of this line item before discounts

finalPrice.description: The final price for this line item after all discounts

productMovingAverageCostPerUnit.description: The moving average cost per unit of the product

optionMovingAverageCostPerUnit.description: The moving average cost per unit of the product option

packageLineCost.description: The total cost for all metrc packages used to fulfill this line item

primaryCategory.description: The primary category for the product of this line item

id.description: The ID of this product category

name.description: The name of the primary category

discounts.description: An array of discounts applied to this line item (may be empty)

discountId.description: The ID for this discount. This value will be null for a custom discount added by a budtender

type.description: Either `flat` for a dollar amount or `percent` for a percent amount off

amount.description: The amount of the discount before being applied. Either in cents or a percent depending on the type.

amountUsed.description: The amount that was taken off of the line item by this discount, represented in cents

description.description: The description of the discount, which may be shown to the customer

fulfillAs.description: An array of objects showing what packages or product options fulfilled this order. Could also be `null` if the line item does not have any packages or substitutions associated with it.

pkg.description: An object about the compliance package for this fulfillment. Please handle both `null` and an empty object `{}` for times when there is not a package

unit.description: The metrc unit of this package

costPerUnit.description: The cost per unit of this package

optionSum.description: A negative number showing how much quantity of the underlying product option was used for this fulfillment. For `option` tracking this will be an integer, but for `product` tracking it could be a decimal.

productOptionId.description: The ID of the product option used for this fulfillment. For most cases, it will be the same as `lineItems[].optionId`, but in cases where another option is substituted to fulfill another (Example: 2 eighths fulfilling a quarter option), this `productOptionId` could be different.

quantityFulfilled.description: The quantity of the underlying `lineItem` that this fulfillment is responsible for

customer.description: The customer attached to this order. Will be an empty object `{}` if there is no customer associated with this order (i.e. it is an anonymous order)

firstName.description: The first name of the customer

lastName.description: The last name of the customer

hashId.description: An ID used to display to the customer and dispensary instead of the `id` number

zip.description: The postal code for the customer

licenseExpiry.description: The expiration date of this customer’s drivers license or `null` if it is not recorded.

medicalExpiration.description: The expiration date of this customer’s medical recommendation or `null` if they are an adult use customer

placedBy.description: The employee that created this order. Will be an empty object `{}` if this order was created by a customer and not an employee.

id.description: The ID of the employee who created this order

firstName.description: The first name of the employee

lastName.description: The last name of the employee

fulfilledBy.description: The employee that fulfilled this order. Will be an empty object `{}` if there is no employee that fulfilled it.

id.description: The ID of the employee who fulfilled this order

firstName.description: The first name of the employee

lastName.description: The last name of the employee

adjustments.description: Adjustments either made automatically such as even dollar rounding or custom adjustments by an employee

amount.description: The amount of the adjustment in cents. May be either negative or positive.

isTaxExemption.description: Set to true if this adjustment was automatically added to offset taxes that were included in the price of a product when a customer is tax exempt

taxid.description: The ID of the tax exempted or `null`

creditId.description: The ID for the credit applied

amountUsed.description: The credit amount applied to the order in cents

discounts.description: The discounts applied to this order

discountId.description: The ID for this discount. This value will be null for a custom discount added by a budtender.

type.description: Either `flat` for a dollar amount or `percent` for a percent amount off

amount.description: The amount of the discount before being applied. Either in cents or a percent depending on the type.

amountUsed.description: The amount of the discount that was applied to the order represented in cents.

description.description: The description of the discount, which may be shown to the customer

loyaltyRedemptions.description: The loyalty redemptions used on this order

description.description: A description of the reward that was redeemed

pointsRequirement.description: The minimum number of loyalty points required to redeem this reward

pointsAmount.description: The amount of points used in this redemption

discountAmount.description: The discount amount of the reward. For `cash-back` this is the amount in cents per point used. For `flat` it is a flat amount in cents, `percent` would be a percent off

amountUsed.description: The amount of the discount applied to the order in cents

productOptionId.description: The product option id for a `free-product` redemption

taxes.description: The taxes applied to this order

amount.description: The amount applied to the order in cents

rate.description: A numeric value for the percentage of a tax

amountBeforeExemption.description: The amount of the tax as calculated before determining what was exempted in cents

amountExempted.description: The amount of the tax reduction due to an exemption in cents

included.description: Whether the amount of this tax was already included in the product of the line items

exemptable.description: Whether this tax is able to be exempted

tier.description: The order of tax compounding. Will be a value between 1 and 5 indicating the order the tax was applied. Each tier may have multiple taxes in it.

normalRate.description: The rate of this tax before it was overriden by an employee

returns.description: The returns applied to this order

refundInitial.description: The initial refund before taxes, credits, adjustments, loyalty, and discounts

refundTotal.description: The final refund total of the return

creditsTotal.description: The amount of credits refunded from the order

discountsTotal.description: The amount of discounts refunded from the order

adjustmentAmount.description: A manual adjustment of the refund for this return

adjustmentDescription.description: A description for the adjustment if there is one

paymentTypeName.description: The name of the payment type this refund was processed as

loyaltyTotal.description: The amount of a loyalty redemption returned

voidedAt.description: The date that this return was voided or `null`. If there is a value here, it means the return was canceled and is no longer applicable

voidedReason.description: The reason this return was voided

createdAt.description: The date this return was created

lineItems.description: An array of line items for this return

orderLineItemId.description: The ID of the `lineItems[].id` that is being returned

quantity.description: The quantity of the order line item being returned

reason.description: A reason this line item is being returned

fulfillAs.description: Fulfillment information for the packages on this return. See `lineItems[].fulfillAs` for possible properties

taxes.description: An array of tax information about this return

amount.description: The amount of tax proportionally applied to this return

refunded.description: A boolean of whether this tax was refunded to the customer or not

included.description: Whether this tax was included in the price of the products

exemptable.description: Whether this tax was exemptable or not

createdBy.description: The employee that created this return

id.description: The id of the employee who created tihs return

firstName.description: The first name of the employee

lastName.description: The last name of the employee

voidedBy.description: The employee that voided this return (or `{}` if it is not voided)

id.description: The id of the employee who created tihs return

firstName.description: The first name of the employee

lastName.description: The last name of the employee

meadowConsumer.name: X-Consumer-Key
meadowConsumer.description: The key assigned to your company and provided via Meadow

meadowClient.name: X-Client-Key
meadowClient.description: The key generated and provided by our mutual client
